text: Eric Smiley is a retired equestrian from Northern Ireland. Smiley competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics and the 1996 Summer Olympics. He was born on 28 June 1951.Eric Smiley == References == == Other websites == * Category:1951 births Category:Event riders Category:Living people Category:Olympians for Ireland Category:Olympic equestrians Category:Sportspeople from Belfast
title: Eric Smiley
